Back to Sergei Prokofiev

Sergei Prokofiev

Music for Children, op. 65

1935

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 19'

  • 1. Matin
  • 2. Promenade
  • 3. Historiette
  • 4. Tarantelle
  • 5. Repentirs
  • 6. Valse
  • 7. Cortège du sauterelles
  • 8. La pluie et l’arc-en-ciel
  • 9. Attrape qui peut
  • 10. Marche
  • 11. Soir
  • 12. Sur les prés la lune se promène

In 1941, Prokofiev orchestrated selected pieces (nos. 1, 9, 6, 5 and 10–12) as the Summer’s Day suite (op. 65bis). In 1950, he included orchestrations of two pieces (nos. 1 and 6) in the ballet The Stone Flower (op. 118).

1. Matin

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 1.5

2. Promenade

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

3. Historiette

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 1

4. Tarantelle

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

5. Repentirs

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

6. Valse

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

7. Cortège du sauterelles

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

8. La pluie et l’arc-en-ciel

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

9. Attrape qui peut

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

10. Marche

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

11. Soir

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

12. Sur les prés la lune se promène

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 1.5
